H0.text: What is the US state capital of Vermont. Burlington

H1.text: What is the US state capital of Vermont. Brattleboro

H2.text: What is the US state capital of Vermont. Rutland

H3.text: What is the US state capital of Vermont. Montpelier

A4.text: Montpelier is the capital city of the U.S. state of Vermont

A5.text: Montpelier was selected as state capital in 1805
